verses.verse: Maschil of Asaph. Give <S%H238>ear<s%>, O my <S%H5971>people<s%>, to my <S%H8451>law<s%>: <S%H5186>Incline<s%> your <S%H241>ears<s%> to the <S%H561>words<s%> of my <S%H6310>mouth<s%>.
I will <S%H6605>open<s%> my <S%H6310>mouth<s%> in a <S%H4912>parable<s%>; I will <S%H5042>utter<s%> dark <S%H2420>sayings<s%> of <S%H6924>old<s%>,
Which we have <S%H8085>heard<s%> and <S%H3045>known<s%>, And our <S%H1>fathers<s%> have told <S%H5608>us<s%>.

We will not <S%H3582>hide<s%> them from their <S%H1121>children<s%>, <S%H5608>Telling<s%> to the <S%H1755>generation<s%> to <S%H314>come<s%> the <S%H8416>praises<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, And his <S%H5807>strength<s%>, and his wondrous <S%H6381>works<s%> that he hath <S%H6213>done<s%>.

For he <S%H6965>established<s%> a <S%H5715>testimony<s%> in <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, And <S%H7760>appointed<s%> a <S%H8451>law<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, Which he <S%H6680>commanded<s%> our <S%H1>fathers<s%>, That they should make them <S%H3045>known<s%> to their <S%H1121>children<s%>;

That the <S%H1755>generation<s%> to <S%H314>come<s%> might <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H1121>them<s%>, even the children that should be <S%H3205>born<s%>; Who should <S%H6965>arise<s%> and <S%H5608>tell<s%> them to their <S%H1121>children<s%>,

That they might <S%H7760>set<s%> their <S%H3689>hope<s%> in <S%H430>God<s%>, And not <S%H7911>forget<s%> the <S%H4611>works<s%> of <S%H410>God<s%>, But <S%H5341>keep<s%> his <S%H4687>commandments<s%>,

And might not be as their <S%H1>fathers<s%>, A <S%H5637>stubborn<s%> and <S%H4784>rebellious<s%> <S%H1755>generation<s%>, A <S%H1755>generation<s%> that <S%H3559>set<s%> not their <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H3559>aright<s%>, And whose <S%H7307>spirit<s%> was not <S%H539>stedfast<s%> with <S%H410>God<s%>.
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>, being <S%H5401>armed<s%> and <S%H7411>carrying<s%> <S%H7198>bows<s%>, Turned <S%H2015>back<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H7128>battle<s%>.
They <S%H8104>kept<s%> not the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, And <S%H3985>refused<s%> to <S%H3212>walk<s%> in his <S%H8451>law<s%>;
And they <S%H7911>forgat<s%> his <S%H5949>doings<s%>, And his wondrous <S%H5949>works<s%> that he had showed <S%H7200>them<s%>.
Marvellous <S%H6382>things<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> he in the <S%H5048>sight<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%>, In the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, in the <S%H7704>field<s%> of <S%H6814>Zoan<s%>.
He <S%H1234>clave<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%>, and caused them to pass <S%H5674>through<s%>; And he made the <S%H4325>waters<s%> to <S%H5324>stand<s%> as a <S%H5067>heap<s%>.
In the <S%H3119>day-time<s%> also he <S%H5148>led<s%> them with a <S%H6051>cloud<s%>, And all the <S%H3915>night<s%> with a <S%H216>light<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%>.
He <S%H1234>clave<s%> <S%H6697>rocks<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, And gave them <S%H8248>drink<s%> abundantly as out of <S%H7227>the<s%> <S%H8415>depths<s%>.
He <S%H3318>brought<s%> <S%H5140>streams<s%> also out of the <S%H5553>rock<s%>, And caused <S%H4325>waters<s%> to run <S%H3381>down<s%> like <S%H5104>rivers<s%>.
Yet went they on <S%H3254>still<s%> to <S%H2398>sin<s%> against <S%H4784>him<s%>, To rebel against the Most <S%H5945>High<s%> in the <S%H6723>desert<s%>.
And they <S%H5254>tempted<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> in their <S%H3824>heart<s%> By <S%H7592>asking<s%> <S%H400>food<s%> according to their <S%H5315>desire<s%>.
Yea <S%H1696><s%>, they spake against <S%H430>God<s%>; They <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H3201>Can<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H6186>prepare<s%> a <S%H7979>table<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>?

Behold <S%H5221><s%>, he smote the <S%H6697>rock<s%>, so that <S%H4325>waters<s%> gushed <S%H2100>out<s%>, And <S%H5158>streams<s%> <S%H7857>overflowed<s%>; <S%H3201>Can<s%> he <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H3201>also<s%>? Will he <S%H3559>provide<s%> <S%H7607>flesh<s%> for his <S%H5971>people<s%>?

Therefore <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%>, and was <S%H5674>wroth<s%>; And a <S%H784>fire<s%> was <S%H5400>kindled<s%> against <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, And <S%H639>anger<s%> also went <S%H5927>up<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel<s%>;
Because they <S%H539>believed<s%> not in <S%H430>God<s%>, And <S%H982>trusted<s%> not in his <S%H3444>salvation<s%>.
Yet he <S%H6680>commanded<s%> the <S%H7834>skies<s%> <S%H4605>above<s%>, And <S%H6605>opened<s%> the <S%H1817>doors<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%>;
And he rained <S%H4305>down<s%> <S%H4478>manna<s%> upon them to <S%H398>eat<s%>, And <S%H5414>gave<s%> them <S%H1715>food<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven<s%>.
Man <S%H376><s%> did <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of the <S%H47>mighty<s%>: He <S%H7971>sent<s%> them <S%H6720>food<s%> to the <S%H7648>full<s%>.
He caused the east <S%H6921>wind<s%> to <S%H5265>blow<s%> in the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>; And by his <S%H5797>power<s%> he <S%H5090>guided<s%> the south <S%H8486>wind<s%>.
He <S%H4305>rained<s%> <S%H7607>flesh<s%> also upon them as the <S%H6083>dust<s%>, And <S%H3671>winged<s%> <S%H5775>birds<s%> as the <S%H2344>sand<s%> of the <S%H3220>seas<s%>:
And he let it <S%H5307>fall<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of their <S%H4264>camp<s%>, Round <S%H5439>about<s%> their <S%H4908>habitations<s%>.
So they did <S%H398>eat<s%>, and were <S%H3966>well<s%> <S%H7646>filled<s%>; And he <S%H935>gave<s%> them their own <S%H8378>desire<s%>.
They were not <S%H2114>estranged<s%> from that which they <S%H8378>desired<s%>, Their <S%H400>food<s%> was yet in their <S%H6310>mouths<s%>,

When the <S%H639>anger<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up against <S%H2026>them<s%>, And slew of the <S%H4924>fattest<s%> of <S%H3766>them<s%>, And smote down the <S%H970>young<s%> men of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
For all this they <S%H2398>sinned<s%> <S%H539>still<s%>, And believed not in his wondrous <S%H6381>works<s%>.
Therefore their <S%H3117>days<s%> did he <S%H3615>consume<s%> in <S%H1892>vanity<s%>, And their <S%H8141>years<s%> in <S%H928>terror<s%>.
When he <S%H2026>slew<s%> <S%H1875>them<s%>, then they inquired after <S%H7725>him<s%>; And they returned and sought <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H7836>earnestly<s%>.
And they <S%H2142>remembered<s%> that <S%H430>God<s%> was their <S%H6697>rock<s%>, And the Most <S%H5945>High<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> their <S%H1350>redeemer<s%>.
But they <S%H6601>flattered<s%> him with their <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, And <S%H3576>lied<s%> unto him with their <S%H3956>tongue<s%>.
For their <S%H3820>heart<s%> was not <S%H3559>right<s%> with <S%H539>him<s%>, Neither were they faithful in his <S%H1285>covenant<s%>.

But <S%H7349>he<s%>, being merciful, <S%H3722>forgave<s%> their <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>, and <S%H7843>destroyed<s%> them <S%H7235>not<s%>: Yea, many a time <S%H7725>turned<s%> he his <S%H639>anger<s%> <S%H7725>away<s%>, And did not stir <S%H5782>up<s%> all his <S%H2534>wrath<s%>.
And he <S%H2142>remembered<s%> that they were but <S%H1320>flesh<s%>, A <S%H7307>wind<s%> that passeth <S%H1980>away<s%>, and cometh not <S%H7725>again<s%>.
How <S%H4100><s%> oft did they <S%H4784>rebel<s%> against him in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, And <S%H6087>grieve<s%> him in the <S%H3452>desert<s%>!
And they <S%H7725>turned<s%> again and <S%H5254>tempted<s%> <S%H410>God<s%>, And <S%H8428>provoked<s%> the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
They <S%H2142>remember<s%> not his <S%H3027>hand<s%>, Nor the <S%H3117>day<s%> when he <S%H6299>redeemed<s%> them from the <S%H6862>adversary<s%>;
How he <S%H7760>set<s%> his <S%H226>signs<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, And his <S%H226>wonders<s%> in the <S%H7704>field<s%> of <S%H6814>Zoan<s%>,
And <S%H2015>turned<s%> their <S%H2975>rivers<s%> into <S%H1818>blood<s%>, And their <S%H2975>streams<s%>, so that they could not <S%H8354>drink<s%>.
He <S%H7971>sent<s%> among them swarms of <S%H6157>flies<s%>, which <S%H398>devoured<s%> <S%H6854>them<s%>; And frogs, which destroyed <S%H7843>them<s%>.
He <S%H5414>gave<s%> also their <S%H2981>increase<s%> unto the <S%H2625>caterpillar<s%>, And their <S%H3018>labor<s%> unto the <S%H697>locust<s%>.
He <S%H2026>destroyed<s%> their <S%H1612>vines<s%> with <S%H1259>hail<s%>, And their <S%H8256>sycomore-trees<s%> with <S%H2602>frost<s%>.
He gave <S%H5462>over<s%> their <S%H1165>cattle<s%> also to the <S%H1259>hail<s%>, And their <S%H4735>flocks<s%> to hot <S%H7565>thunderbolts<s%>.

He <S%H7971>cast<s%> upon them the <S%H2740>fierceness<s%> of his <S%H639>anger<s%>, <S%H5678>Wrath<s%>, and <S%H2195>indignation<s%>, and <S%H6869>trouble<s%>, A <S%H4917>band<s%> of <S%H4397>angels<s%> of <S%H7451>evil<s%>.

He <S%H6424>made<s%> a <S%H5410>path<s%> for his <S%H639>anger<s%>; He <S%H2820>spared<s%> not their <S%H5315>soul<s%> from <S%H4194>death<s%>, But <S%H5462>gave<s%> their <S%H2416>life<s%> <S%H5462>over<s%> to the <S%H1698>pestilence<s%>,
And <S%H5221>smote<s%> all the <S%H1060>first-born<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, The <S%H7225>chief<s%> of their <S%H202>strength<s%> in the <S%H168>tents<s%> of <S%H2526>Ham<s%>.
But he led <S%H5265>forth<s%> his own <S%H5971>people<s%> like <S%H6629>sheep<s%>, And <S%H5090>guided<s%> them in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> like a <S%H5739>flock<s%>.
And he <S%H5148>led<s%> them <S%H983>safely<s%>, so that they <S%H6342>feared<s%> <S%H3220>not<s%>; But the sea <S%H3680>overwhelmed<s%> their <S%H341>enemies<s%>.
And he <S%H935>brought<s%> them to the <S%H1366>border<s%> of his <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%>, To this <S%H2022>mountain<s%>, which his right <S%H3225>hand<s%> had <S%H7069>gotten<s%>.

He drove <S%H1644>out<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> also <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H5307>them<s%>, And allotted them for an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> by <S%H2256>line<s%>, And made the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in their <S%H168>tents<s%>.
Yet they <S%H5254>tempted<s%> and <S%H4784>rebelled<s%> against the Most <S%H5945>High<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>, And <S%H8104>kept<s%> not his <S%H5713>testimonies<s%>;
But turned <S%H5472>back<s%>, and dealt <S%H898>treacherously<s%> like their <S%H1>fathers<s%>: They were turned <S%H2015>aside<s%> like a <S%H7423>deceitful<s%> <S%H7198>bow<s%>.
For they provoked him to <S%H3707>anger<s%> with their high <S%H1116>places<s%>, And moved him to <S%H7065>jealousy<s%> with their graven <S%H6456>images<s%>.
When <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H5674>this<s%>, he was wroth, And <S%H3966>greatly<s%> <S%H3988>abhorred<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>;
So that he <S%H5203>forsook<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of <S%H7887>Shiloh<s%>, The <S%H168>tent<s%> which he <S%H7931>placed<s%> among <S%H120>men<s%>;
And <S%H5414>delivered<s%> his <S%H5797>strength<s%> into <S%H7628>captivity<s%>, And his <S%H8597>glory<s%> into the <S%H6862>adversary<s%>'s <S%H3027>hand<s%>.
He <S%H5462>gave<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5462>over<s%> also unto the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, And was <S%H5674>wroth<s%> with his <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>.
Fire <S%H784><s%> <S%H398>devoured<s%> their young <S%H970>men<s%>; And their <S%H1330>virgins<s%> had no <S%H1984>marriage-song<s%>.
Their <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%>; And their <S%H490>widows<s%> made no <S%H1058>lamentation<s%>.
Then the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3364>awaked<s%> as one out of <S%H3463>sleep<s%>, Like a mighty <S%H1368>man<s%> that <S%H7442>shouteth<s%> by reason of <S%H3196>wine<s%>.
And he <S%H5221>smote<s%> his <S%H6862>adversaries<s%> <S%H268>backward<s%>: He <S%H5414>put<s%> them to a <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H2781>reproach<s%>.
Moreover he <S%H3988>refused<s%> the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>, And <S%H977>chose<s%> not the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>,
But <S%H977>chose<s%> the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, The <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H6726>Zion<s%> which he <S%H157>loved<s%>.
And he <S%H1129>built<s%> his <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> like the <S%H7311>heights<s%>, Like the <S%H776>earth<s%> which he hath <S%H3245>established<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>.
He <S%H977>chose<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> also his <S%H5650>servant<s%>, And <S%H3947>took<s%> him from the <S%H4356>sheepfolds<s%>:

From <S%H310>following<s%> the ewes that have their <S%H5763>young<s%> he <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H7462>him<s%>, To be the shepherd of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%>, and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> his <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>.
So he was their <S%H7462>shepherd<s%> according to the <S%H8537>integrity<s%> of his <S%H3824>heart<s%>, And <S%H5148>guided<s%> them by the <S%H8394>skilfulness<s%> of his <S%H3709>hands<s%>.
